text:
[Verse]
Up in the blue night
Stars are so bright
Wishing on a dream
Floating like a kite

[Verse 2]
Hopes whisper low
To the moon's glow
In the quiet sky
Endless paths we'll go

[Chorus]
Dreams in the sky
Catch them as they fly
Hold on tight to dreams
Reach up way up high

[Verse 3]
Winds of change here
Chasing away fear
Songs in the night air
Feel the future near

[Bridge]
Heartbeats in time
To a silent rhyme
Moments to treasure
In a world that's mine

[Chorus]
Dreams in the sky
Catch them as they fly
Hold on tight to dreams
Reach up way up high
title: Dreams in the Sky
